AI Description: The 'r-colorspace' package is a collection of color models and color conversion functions for R. It provides a flexible and easy-to-use environment for working with colors in various color spaces, including HCL (Hue-Chroma-Luminance), HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance), HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value), CIELAB, RGB, and more. This package facilitates color manipulation, transformation, and visualization for data analysis and visualization tasks.
Core Features: Support for multiple color models and spaces
